About Adding Existing Directories to Projects

You can add all of the files in a directory or entire directory tree to a Serena ChangeMan Version Manager project or project database at one time. When you add directories, Version Manager automatically:

  • Creates a project with the same name as the directory and adds the files in the directories to the project.
  • Creates an archive for each file in the directory.
  • Checks each file in the directory in to the new archives. This creates initial revisions of each file.
  • Creates subprojects when subdirectories are added and adds the files in the subdirectories to the subprojects.
